In Malaysia, over 100,000 people were evacuated...
...after the worst monsoon floods in decades hit the country.
In Croatia, voters gear up for the December 28 presidential elections.
In the Vatican, the Pope prays for martyrs in the fight for religious freedom...
...as he marks the Feast of St. Stephen with the Angelus prayer.
The police rescue 1000 cats from traffickers in Northeast China.
And finally from Germany, joggers join the Goose Run to burn off Christmas calories.
